name: SAMD_ISR_Servo
keywords: timing, device, control, timer, interrupt, isr, isr-based, servo, isr-servo, hardware-timer, mission-critical, accuracy, precise, non-blocking, samd21, samd51, samd, nano-33-iot, samd-zero, itsybitsy-m4
description: This library enables you to use 1 Hardware Timer on SAMD21/SAMD51-based board, such as Nano-33-IoT, Seeeduino XIAO, Adafruit Itsy-Bitsy M4, etc. to control up to 16 or more servo motors.
